text: Lisa Hop (born 19 October 1998) is a Dutch softball pitcher. Hop plays with Olympia Haarlem in the highest Dutch league. She is member of the Netherlands women's national softball team. At the World Championships in Japan she was a member of the team, but didn't play. She made her international debut on 18 September 2018. With the national team she became European champion at the 2022 Women's Softball European Championship. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch softball players Category:People from Vlaardingen Category:Sportspeople from South Holland Category:Sportswomen
title: Lisa Hop
